product.title: Sam and the Firefly | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
One night an owl named Sam teaches a fun-loving firefly named Gus how to write words with the light of the firefly’s tail. But then Gus can’t resist causing mischief! The simple words in the classic story Sam and the Firefly by P.D. Eastman convey an important lesson about responsibility and doing the right thing.

Tie-in Activity: In a darkened room, let your baby’s eyes follow the moving flashlight beam on the wall. Or if space and safety allow, let your child “chase” the beam of light.
